group.label: Firmware
group.description: Polycom Support only distributes firmware upgrades to certified resellers. It might be possible though to find the necessary files on the Internet. Otherwise, please contact your local reseller.

setting.name: sip.ver

setting.name: bootrom.ld
setting.label: bootrom.ld
setting.description: bootrom.ld file. The new BootROM 3.x supports HTTP, HTTPS, and FTPS boot server protocols, but once upgraded to this release the phone cannot be downgraded again to prior versions. If you do not require these additional boot protocols, do not upgrade but instead stay with BootROM 2.6.1 or 2.6.2.

setting.name: bootrom.ver
setting.label: bootrom.ver
setting.description: If using BootROM version prior to 2.6.1 you will also need the file bootrom.ver.

setting.name: directory.xml

setting.description: Directory of common numbers to dial. See Polycom manual for file format details.
